text: Shas, Hebrew: ש״ס , full name: Shomrei Sfarad, Hebrew: שומרי ספרד , meaning (Religious) guardians of the Sephardim, is an Israeli political party. Its ideology is left-wing conservative, Sephardic-Mizrahic Ultra-Orthodox, and Religious Zionist. Political leader is Aryeh Deri. Shas was founded in 1984. Number of seats in the 24th Knesset: 9 (/). Participating in the Fourth Netanyahu Government and the Netanyahu-Gantz Government. == Other websites == * Category:1984 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Israel Category:Judaism in Israel Category:Political parties in Israel Category:Zionist parties
title: Shas
